subject: Fenway Park (Boston)
Stadiums and Arenas
Baseball
lead_paragraph: For all the “improvements” in recent years, Fenway Park, and the Fenway experience, are essentially unchanged from 1912. Particularly those glorious home runs to left.
snippet: For all the “improvements” in recent years, Fenway Park, and the Fenway experience, are essentially unchanged from 1912. Particularly those glorious home runs to left.
